channel.title: Aerodynamics on CodeBlue
channel.description: Recent content in Aerodynamics on CodeBlue

item.title: FSAE_Car
item.description: AIM: The aim of this project is to simulate the flow around an FSAE car in converge. OBJECTIVES OF THE PROJECT: Clean up the geometry Flag the parts as separate boundaries Create a virtual wind tunnel Run the simulation for two different types of Races Race-1 Racing track conditions - Lot of turns Average lap speeds - 45kmph 70% turns at 45 degrees 20% turns at 80 degrees 10% turns at 20 degrees
